# Portfolio Development Setup

This checklist tracks the setup and development of your full-stack portfolio website.

## Project Setup
- [x] Frontend and backend directories created
- [x] React + Vite frontend configured
- [x] Express.js backend configured
- [x] Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion integrated
- [x] API endpoints set up

## Frontend Components
- [x] Navbar with smooth animations
- [x] Hero section with CTAs
- [x] About section with skills grid
- [x] Projects showcase with cards
- [x] Contact form
- [x] Footer

## Backend API
- [x] Health check endpoint
- [x] Portfolio info endpoint
- [x] Projects list endpoint
- [x] Skills endpoint
- [x] Contact form endpoint
- [x] Error handling

## Next Steps
- [ ] Install dependencies: `npm install` in both directories
- [ ] Create `.env` file in backend from `.env.example`
- [ ] Start both servers in separate terminals
- [ ] Test API endpoints
- [ ] Customize personal information
- [ ] Add project images
- [ ] Deploy frontend (Vercel/Netlify)
- [ ] Deploy backend (Railway/Heroku)

## Animation Features
- Page load animations
- Hover effects on buttons
- Scroll-triggered animations
- Staggered child animations
- Smooth transitions

## Customization Points
- Colors in `tailwind.config.js`
- Project data in `server.js`
- Components in `frontend/src/components/`
- API base URL for production deployment
